item.title: About
item.description: About me I’m Aidan, a third year undergraduate at the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign studying computer science and statistics. I’m originally from the Chicagoland area, I’ve worked in multiple research groups on campus, and I’ve previously done internships at AARP and Amazon. I’m mainly interested in working with distributed systems, video, or computer vision, however I’m open to most software engineering roles. I’ll be looking for new grad software engineer roles once I graduate in May 2023.
